name: Quack! (Bob's Stuff)
description:
16K ZX81 - 2014

Everybody seems to be going crazy over Flappy Bird at the moment, and a lot of clones have instantly appeared on the market - so why not one for the ZX81?

Written in an afternoon to capitalise on the media frenzy, it's got all the gameplay of the original, but none of the in-app adverts which have been making the author so much money recently - but you can always donate to make me rich! ;D
